main event: Two objects reported to be satellites by observers sighted over Hague, New York, heading southeast for 3 minutes. The objects had no sound and disappeared suddenly.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on August 5, 1962, at 10:10 PM,The objects were visible for about three minutes,No satellites were scheduled to be visible according to the New York Times, One witness speculated that they might belong to the USSR, There were insufficient data for thorough evaluation.
witness description: A 45-year-old male schoolteacher with a significant educational background.
